hero.title: Sell on Jemo
hero.subtitle: Grow Your Business Online Across Cameroon
hero.description: Jemo is a trusted online marketplace that helps vendors reach more customers, sell faster, and deliver efficiently across cities in Cameroon. Whether you are a small business, shop owner, or large distributor, Jemo gives you the tools to sell online with confidence.

whySell.title: Why Sell on Jemo?
whySell.subtitle: Everything you need to grow your business online

reach.title: Reach More Customers
reach.description: Show your products to thousands of buyers across different cities without the cost of opening multiple physical shops.

payment.title: Flexible Payment Options
payment.description: You control how customers pay: Online payment (MTN MoMo / Orange Money), Pay on delivery, or Hybrid options for different cities.

delivery.title: Easy Delivery Management
delivery.description: Choose how your products are delivered: Self Delivery – handle it yourself, or Jemo Delivery – let our verified partners handle shipping.

secure.title: Secure Transactions
secure.description: Payments are securely collected, held safely until the order is received, then credited to your vendor wallet.

register.title: Create Your Vendor Account
register.description: Register as a vendor and set up your store with your business details. It's quick and easy to get started.

products.title: Add Your Products
products.description: Upload product images, descriptions, prices, delivery options, and payment preferences.

orders.title: Receive Orders
orders.description: Customers place orders directly on the platform. You'll get instant notifications when a new order arrives.

deliver.title: Confirm & Deliver
deliver.description: Confirm the order, choose delivery method (self delivery or Jemo delivery partner), and track the order status in real time.

paid.title: Get Paid
paid.description: Online payments go to your vendor wallet. Withdraw earnings anytime via Mobile Money. Pay on delivery orders are settled directly.

wallet.title: Vendor Wallet & Payments
wallet.description: Every vendor has a secure wallet where online payments are credited, pending transactions are tracked, and completed orders unlock funds for withdrawal.
wallet.creditedDesc: All online payments from customers are automatically added to your wallet balance.
wallet.pendingDesc: Monitor all pending payments and orders awaiting confirmation in one place.
wallet.secureDesc: Funds are released for withdrawal after customer confirms receipt of their order.

secureRelease.title: Secure Release of Funds
secureRelease.step2: Funds are held safely during transit

orderManagement.title: Order Management Made Simple
orderManagement.subtitle: View all orders in one dashboard, confirm or cancel orders, track delivery status, and communicate with customers when needed.

self.title: Self Delivery
self.point2: Product price + delivery fee goes to you

whoCanSell.title: Who Can Sell on Jemo?
whoCanSell.subtitle: If you have a product to sell, Jemo gives you the platform to grow.

support.title: Support & Dispute Resolution
support.description: We provide vendor support assistance, order dispute resolution, delivery issue handling, and secure communication channels.

cta.title: Start Selling Today
cta.description: Join thousands of businesses already growing on Jemo. Create your vendor account today and start selling online.
cta.tagline: Sell smarter. Deliver faster. Grow with Jemo.

hero.title: About Jemo
hero.subtitle: Connecting Buyers, Sellers, and Delivery Across Cameroon
hero.description: Jemo is an online marketplace built to make buying, selling, and delivering goods across Cameroon simple, secure, and reliable. We connect customers with trusted local vendors and verified delivery partners, helping businesses grow while giving customers access to products from anywhere in the country.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to empower local businesses, simplify commerce, and create a reliable digital marketplace where anyone can buy, sell, or send packages with confidence.
mission.belief: We believe technology should remove barriers, not create them.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Jemo provides a complete marketplace ecosystem:

builtForCameroon.title: Built for Cameroon
builtForCameroon.description: Jemo is designed specifically for the Cameroonian market.
builtForCameroon.understand4: Customer expectations for speed and reliability

secure.title: Secure & Transparent Transactions
secure.subtitle: Security and trust are at the core of Jemo.
secure.feature3: Orders follow a clear status flow
secure.fairness: Our system ensures fairness for both buyers and sellers.

empowering.title: Empowering Local Businesses
empowering.description: We believe small and medium-sized businesses are the backbone of the economy.
empowering.backbone: Jemo gives vendors the tools they need to succeed online.
empowering.noBarriers: No complex systems. No unnecessary barriers.

delivery.title: Reliable Delivery Network
delivery.subtitle: We partner with professional local delivery agencies to ensure:
delivery.conclusion: Whether it's a product or a personal package, Jemo makes delivery easier.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become Cameroon's most trusted digital commerce platform, connecting people, products, and logistics seamlessly across cities and communities.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Jemo?
whyChoose.reason2: Supports online payment and pay on delivery
whyChoose.ecosystem: Jemo is not just a marketplace — it's a growing ecosystem.

cta.title: Join the Jemo Community
cta.description: Whether you're a buyer, vendor, or delivery partner, Jemo is built for you.
cta.tagline: Buy smarter. Sell better. Deliver faster.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.description: Welcome to Jemo. By accessing or using our website, mobile application, or services (collectively, the "Platform"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
hero.warning: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our Platform.

about.title: 1. About Jemo
about.desc1: Jemo is an online marketplace that connects independent vendors ("Sellers") with customers ("Buyers").
about.desc2: Jemo does not own, manufacture, store, or directly sell the products listed on the platform. All products are listed, priced, and fulfilled by third-party vendors.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.subtitle: To use Jemo, you must:
eligibility.req1: Be at least 18 years old or have legal parental/guardian consent
eligibility.req2: Provide accurate and complete information during registration
eligibility.req3: Use the platform for lawful purposes only
eligibility.note: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

registration.title: 3.1 Registration
registration.desc: To place orders or sell products, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for:
registration.point2: All activities that occur under your account

termination.title: 3.2 Account Termination
termination.desc: Jemo reserves the right to suspend or terminate any account for:

vendors.title: 4. Vendors (Sellers)
vendors.subtitle: Vendors on Jemo are independent businesses. By selling on Jemo, vendors agree to:
vendors.obligation1: Provide accurate product descriptions, prices, and images
vendors.obligation3: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
vendors.obligation4: Handle returns, refunds, and warranties according to their stated policies
vendors.note: Jemo is not responsible for vendor actions, product quality, or fulfillment issues.

orders.title: 5. Orders and Payments
orders.point1: When you place an order, you are entering into a direct transaction with the vendor
orders.point2: Prices and availability are set by vendors and may change without notice
orders.point3: Payments are processed through approved payment partners
orders.point4: Jemo may charge service or platform fees, where applicable
orders.note: Orders may be canceled if payment fails, products are unavailable, or fraudulent activity is suspected.

shipping.title: 6. Shipping and Delivery
shipping.point1: Delivery timelines are provided by vendors and may vary
shipping.point2: Jemo does not guarantee delivery times
shipping.point3: Any delays caused by vendors, logistics partners, or external factors are beyond Jemo's direct control

returns.title: 7. Returns, Refunds, and After-Sales
returns.desc1: Return and refund policies are set by individual vendors.
returns.desc2: Jemo may assist in dispute resolution but does not guarantee refunds, as products are not owned by Jemo.
returns.link: For full details, please refer to our Returns & After-Sales Policy

ip.title: 8. Intellectual Property
ip.desc1: All content on Jemo (logos, branding, design, text, software) is the property of Jemo or its licensors and may not be copied, modified, or reused without permission.
ip.desc2: Vendor content remains the property of the respective vendors.

prohibited.title: 9. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.subtitle: You agree not to:
prohibited.activity1: Use the platform for illegal or fraudulent purposes
prohibited.activity2: Upload false, misleading, or offensive content
prohibited.activity3: Interfere with the platform's security or functionality
prohibited.activity4: Circumvent platform fees or payment systems
prohibited.warning: Violations may result in account suspension or legal action.

liability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
liability.subtitle: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
liability.point1: Jemo is not liable for product defects, losses, damages, or disputes between buyers and vendors
liability.point2: Jemo is not responsible for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
liability.note: Use of the platform is at your own risk.

indemnity.title: 11. Indemnification
indemnity.subtitle: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Jemo, its owners, employees, and partners from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from:

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.desc1: Jemo reserves the right to update or modify these Terms at any time.
changes.desc2: Changes will be effective once posted on the platform. Continued use of Jemo constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

law.title: 13. Governing Law
law.desc: These Terms are governed by the laws applicable in Cameroon, unless otherwise required by law.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.subtitle: For questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us:

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Welcome to Jemo. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us when using our platform.
hero.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit or make use of the Jemo marketplace.

about.title: 1. About Jemo
about.desc1: Jemo is an online marketplace that connects buyers with independent vendors offering various household and consumer products.
about.desc2: Jemo does not own, manufacture, or store products listed on the platform. Each vendor is responsible for their products, fulfillment, and after-sales obligations.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.subtitle: We may collect the following types of information:

personal.title: a. Personal Information
personal.item5: Payment-related details (processed securely via third-party providers)

auto.title: c. Automatically Collected Information
auto.note: This information helps us improve our services and user experience.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.subtitle: We use your information to:
usage.reason3: Facilitate communication between buyers and vendors
usage.reason5: Send order updates, notifications, and service messages

sharing.title: 4. Sharing of Information
sharing.noSell: We do not sell or rent your personal information.
sharing.subtitle: Your information may be shared with:

party1.title: Vendors
party1.desc: Only the details necessary to fulfill your order (such as name, phone number, and delivery address)

sharing.note: All third parties are expected to handle your data responsibly.

vendor.title: 5. Vendor Responsibility
vendor.subtitle: As a marketplace:
vendor.point1: Vendors receive only the information required to complete an order
vendor.point2: Vendors are responsible for protecting customer data they receive
vendor.point3: Jemo is not responsible for how vendors store or use customer data outside the platform
vendor.note: We encourage users to transact only through Jemo to ensure data protection.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.subtitle: Jemo uses cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.note: You may choose to disable cookies in your browser, but some features of the platform may not function properly.

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.subtitle: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including:
security.note: However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
rights.subtitle: You have the right to:
rights.note: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details below.

thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Links
thirdParty.desc1: Jemo may contain links to third-party websites or services.
thirdParty.desc2: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.desc1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
changes.desc2: Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
changes.note: We encourage users to review this policy regularly.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

hero.title: Returns & After-Sales Policy
hero.subtitle: Jemo Marketplace
hero.description: At Jemo, we connect buyers with trusted sellers across Cameroon. Because we are a marketplace, products listed on Jemo are sold and fulfilled by independent vendors, and return conditions may vary by seller. However, we are committed to protecting buyers and ensuring fair after-sales support.

disclaimer.title: 1. Marketplace Responsibility Disclaimer
disclaimer.point1: Jemo does not own, manufacture, or stock the products sold on the platform.
disclaimer.point2: Each seller is responsible for the quality, packaging, warranty, and return terms of their products.
disclaimer.point3: Jemo acts as a facilitator and mediator to help resolve disputes when needed.

eligible.title: 2. Eligible Reasons for Returns
eligible.subtitle: You may request a return or refund under the following conditions:
eligible.reason2: The product is damaged or defective upon delivery
eligible.reason3: The item is not as described on the product page
eligible.reason4: The product is missing parts or accessories
eligible.warning: ⚠️ The issue must be reported within 48 hours of delivery.

nonReturnable.title: 3. Non-Returnable Items
nonReturnable.subtitle: The following items may not be eligible for return, unless defective:
nonReturnable.item5: Items clearly marked "Non-Returnable" on the product page

howTo.title: 4. How to Request a Return
howTo.subtitle: To request a return or report an issue:
howTo.step5: Upload clear photos or videos showing the problem
howTo.note: Once submitted, the seller and Jemo support team will review your request.

approval.title: 5. Return Approval & Process
approval.point1: If approved, the seller will provide return instructions
approval.point2: Items must be returned in original condition, with packaging and accessories
approval.point3: Return shipping fees may be covered by the seller if the fault is theirs
approval.warning: Failure to follow return instructions may result in rejection.

refund.title: 6. Refund Policy
refund.point1: Refunds are issued after the seller receives and inspects the returned item
refund.point2: Refunds are processed via the original payment method or Jemo wallet

afterSales.title: 7. After-Sales Support & Warranty
afterSales.point1: Product warranties (if any) are provided by sellers or manufacturers
afterSales.point2: Jemo can help you contact the seller for warranty claims
afterSales.point3: After-sales services such as repairs or replacements depend on the seller's policy

dispute.title: 8. Dispute Resolution
dispute.subtitle: If a seller fails to respond or resolve an issue:
dispute.point1: Jemo will step in as a neutral mediator
dispute.point2: Our decision will be based on evidence provided by both parties
dispute.point3: Jemo reserves the right to suspend sellers who violate platform policies

sellerPolicy.title: 9. Seller Policy Variations
sellerPolicy.subtitle: Some sellers may offer:
sellerPolicy.note: Always review the seller's return policy on the product page before purchasing.

contact.title: 10. Contact Jemo Support
contact.subtitle: For assistance with returns or after-sales issues:

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about shopping, shipping, payments, and more.

services.question: What services do you offer?
services.answer: We provide reliable shipping and logistics services, including international shipping, local delivery, vendor-based shopping, cargo consolidation, and doorstep delivery. Customers can shop from approved vendors or ship their own goods through our platform.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.step1: Click on the Register button on our website
createAccount.step2: Fill in your personal details (name, email, phone number, and password)
createAccount.step3: Verify your email or phone number
createAccount.step4: Log in and start shopping or shipping immediately

needAccount.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
needAccount.benefit4: Communicate easily with vendors and support

placeOrder.question: How do I place an order?

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?

paymentType.question: Is payment made online or in person?
paymentType.answer: Most orders are paid online for faster processing, but in some cases, in-person or on-delivery payment may be available depending on the service and location.

deliveryTime.question: How long does delivery take?
deliveryTime.answer: Delivery time depends on shipping destination, type of service selected (standard or express), and customs clearance for international shipments. Estimated delivery times are shown during checkout.

trackShipment.question: How can I track my shipment?
trackShipment.feature1: A tracking number sent to you

international.question: Do you offer international shipping?
international.answer: Yes. We ship to and from the USA and other supported countries. International shipping includes cargo consolidation and customs handling where applicable.

becomeVendor.question: Can I become a vendor on your platform?
becomeVendor.answer: Yes! Vendors are welcome to sell products through our platform. Visit the Vendor Registration page to apply, submit your business details, and get approved.

prohibitedItems.question: What items are prohibited from shipping?

delayedPackage.question: What happens if my package is delayed?
delayedPackage.answer: If delays occur due to weather, customs, or unforeseen circumstances, we will notify you immediately and provide updates until delivery is completed.

security.question: Is my information secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use secure systems and encryption to protect your personal and payment information at all times.

moreHelp.question: Who do I contact for more help?
moreHelp.answer: If you need assistance, visit our Contact Us page or call our support line. We're always happy to help.

seller.benefit1: Reach thousands of customers across Cameroon
seller.benefit3: Secure payments and reliable delivery options
seller.benefit4: Full support from our vendor success team

help.title: Still Have Questions?
help.description: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or concerns.

hero.title: Shopping Guide
hero.subtitle: Everything You Need to Know to Shop on Jemo
hero.description: Welcome to Jemo! This guide will walk you through the simple steps to register, place an order, make payments, and receive your items safely.

register.title: How to Register
register.subtitle: Creating an account on Jemo is fast and free.
register.step1: Click on Register at the top of the website
register.step2: Enter your full name, phone number (Cameroon numbers only), and password
register.step3: Complete the verification step to confirm you're human
register.note: Once registered, you can log in anytime using your phone number and password.

order.title: How to Place an Order
order.subtitle: Shopping on Jemo is simple and secure.
order.step1: Browse products or search for what you need
order.step2: Click on a product to view full details
order.step3: Choose your quantity, delivery location, and delivery option
order.step5: Review your order details before confirming
order.note: Your order will be sent to the vendor for confirmation.

payment.title: How to Pay
payment.subtitle: Jemo supports flexible payment options depending on the product and vendor.
payment.step2: Choose MTN MoMo or Orange Money
payment.step3: Complete the payment on your phone
payment.step4: You'll receive a payment confirmation instantly
payment.secureNote: For online payments, your money is held securely until your order is completed.

delivery.title: Delivery Information
delivery.subtitle: Jemo offers multiple delivery options to suit your needs.

jemo.title: Jemo Delivery
jemo.desc: Delivered by our partnered shipping agencies

delivery.feesDesc: Delivery fees are calculated automatically based on:
delivery.feesNote: Fees are shown clearly before you place your order.

status.completedDesc: Order delivered and marked as received

reviews.title: Order Completion & Reviews
reviews.step1: Once you receive your order, go to My Orders
reviews.step3: You'll then be able to leave a review for the vendor and product
reviews.note: Reviews help other buyers shop with confidence.

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: If you need assistance at any stage, our team is here for you.
help.tagline: Our team is always ready to help you shop with ease and confidence.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We're Here to Help
hero.description: Have a question, need support, or want to partner with us? The Jemo team is always ready to assist you.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Our support team can help you with:

partners.title: Vendors & Partners
partners.subtitle: Interested in becoming a vendor or delivery partner?

urgent.title: Need Immediate Help?
urgent.description: For urgent issues related to active orders or deliveries, please call or message us directly on WhatsApp for faster assistance.

chat.loginRequiredDesc: Please log in to start a conversation with our support team.
chat.startConversation: Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

hero.title: Disclaimer
hero.description: Please read this disclaimer carefully before using the Jemo platform. By accessing or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this disclaimer.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: The information provided on Jemo is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information up to date and accurate, we make no representations or warranties of any kind about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, or availability of the platform or the products listed therein.

general.title: 1. General Disclaimer
general.desc1: Jemo is an online marketplace platform that facilitates transactions between independent buyers and sellers. We provide the technology and platform to connect these parties but do not participate directly in transactions between them.
general.desc2: Any reliance you place on information available through Jemo is strictly at your own risk. We disclaim all liability and responsibility arising from any reliance placed on such materials by you or any other visitor to the platform.

marketplace.title: 2. Marketplace Nature
marketplace.subtitle: As a marketplace platform, it is important to understand that:
marketplace.point1: Jemo does not own, manufacture, store, or inspect any of the products listed on the platform
marketplace.point2: All products are listed, priced, described, and fulfilled entirely by independent third-party vendors
marketplace.point3: Jemo does not guarantee the quality, safety, legality, or accuracy of products or listings
marketplace.point4: We are not a party to transactions between buyers and sellers

product.title: 3. Product Liability
product.subtitle: Regarding products sold on Jemo:
product.point1: Jemo is not responsible for any product defects, damage, or quality issues
product.point2: Vendors are solely responsible for the accuracy of product descriptions, images, and specifications
product.point3: Product warranties, if any, are provided by vendors or manufacturers, not by Jemo
product.point4: Any claims regarding products must be directed to the respective vendor

accuracy.title: 4. Accuracy of Information
accuracy.point1: Product information, prices, and availability are provided by vendors and may change without notice
accuracy.point2: We do not verify, endorse, or guarantee the accuracy of information provided by vendors or users
accuracy.point3: Images shown may differ from actual products, and descriptions may contain errors
accuracy.note: We recommend contacting vendors directly for critical product specifications before purchase.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Links & Services
thirdParty.desc1: Jemo may contain links to external websites or services that are not operated by us. We have no control over the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party sites.
thirdParty.desc2: We do not endorse or assume responsibility for any third-party sites, services, or content. Your interactions with third parties are solely between you and them.
thirdParty.desc3: We encourage you to review the terms and privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

warranty.title: 6. No Warranties
warranty.subtitle: The platform and all content are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We expressly disclaim all warranties of any kind, including but not limited to:
warranty.point1: Warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose
warranty.point2: Warranties that the platform will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free
warranty.point3: Warranties regarding the accuracy or reliability of information
warranty.point4: Warranties related to the products sold by third-party vendors

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.desc1: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Jemo and its owners, employees, affiliates, and partners shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the platform.
liability.desc2: This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, data, goodwill, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
liability.note: Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of certain warranties or limitation of liability, so some of the above may not apply to you.

user.title: 8. User Responsibility
user.subtitle: As a user of Jemo, you are responsible for:
user.responsibility1: Verifying product information and vendor credibility before making purchases
user.responsibility2: Reading and understanding vendor return policies before ordering
user.responsibility3: Using the platform in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
user.responsibility4: Protecting your account credentials and reporting unauthorized access
user.responsibility5: Communicating honestly and respectfully with vendors and other users

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Disclaimer
changes.desc1: We reserve the right to modify or replace this disclaimer at any time at our sole discretion.
changes.desc2: Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the platform with an updated revision date.
changes.note: Your continued use of Jemo after any changes constitutes acceptance of the modified disclaimer.

contact.title: Questions About This Disclaimer?
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or concerns about this disclaimer, please contact us.
